name: DECEPTIO (Neprim, Sofa Strange, PixelQuasar, olabongos, PascalOz)
name_original: DECEPTIO (Neprim, Sofa Strange, PixelQuasar, olabongos, PascalOz)
description:
There are rumors of Black Smuggling Markets all over space. Every few months, hundreds of illegal immigrants dock their ships under a large invisible canvas and invite only special people.

You receive this invitation on behalf of the player and find a special car in the caravan of ships, where you are offered to try a unique technology for managing people. But is everything as good as it seems at first glance?

Credits:
Game leader & Story/lore writer - PascalOz
Story/lore assistant - Sofach
Main programmer - Neprim
Visual artist - Olabongos
Sound design and music - PixelQuasar
Russian/English translation - PascalOz, Olabongos, Marine367⁣

(Дисклеймер русским: в настройках вы можете поменять язык ;) )
